borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: There are two trees located in the backyard of 35 Ellerby Street. One tree labelled as remaining and one tree labelled as being removed, which is centred in the back half of the rear of the garden. The tree being removed is a Pear TreeProposed Works:Clear the area around the base of the treeDue to the tree being located to the back of the property, it will be best to drop the tree towards the direction of the house Slim down the tree by removing the easily accessible branches.Start cutting at a 70 degree angle Cut a wedge out of the tree???s trunkCut horizontally from the opposite side of the trunk until a small amount of the tree???s diameter remains. Push it in the direction of the wedge in the trunkAssess any services that may be running nearby the treeExpose and remove the smaller roots on the expanses Expose and remove the larger roots and dispose of the trunk
